    const_from(node) click to toggle source

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [String]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 35
def const_from node
  if node.is_a?(AST::Node) and node.type == :const
    result = ''
    unless node.children[0].nil?
      result = const_from(node.children[0])
    end
    if result == ''
      result = node.children[1].to_s
    else
      result = result + '::' + node.children[1].to_s
    end
    result
  else
    nil
  end
end
    drill_signature(node, signature) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 103
def drill_signature node, signature
  return signature unless node.is_a?(AST::Node)
  if node.type == :const or node.type == :cbase
    unless node.children[0].nil?
      signature += drill_signature(node.children[0], signature)
    end
    signature += '::' unless signature.empty?
    signature += node.children[1].to_s
  elsif node.type == :lvar or node.type == :ivar or node.type == :cvar
    signature += '.' unless signature.empty?
    signature += node.children[0].to_s
  elsif node.type == :send
    unless node.children[0].nil?
      signature += drill_signature(node.children[0], signature)
    end
    signature += '.' unless signature.empty?
    signature += node.children[1].to_s
  end
  signature
end
    get_node_end_position(node) click to toggle source

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [Position]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 99
def get_node_end_position(node)
  Position.new(node.loc.last_line, node.loc.last_column)
end

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 93
def get_node_start_position(node)
  Position.new(node.loc.line, node.loc.column)
end
    infer_literal_node_type(node) click to toggle source

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [String]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 54
def infer_literal_node_type node
  return nil unless node.is_a?(AST::Node)
  if node.type == :str || node.type == :dstr
    return 'String'
  elsif node.type == :array
    return 'Array'
  elsif node.type == :hash
    return 'Hash'
  elsif node.type == :int
    return 'Integer'
  elsif node.type == :float
    return 'Float'
  elsif node.type == :sym
    return 'Symbol'
  elsif node.type == :regexp
    return 'Regexp'
  elsif node.type == :irange
    return 'Range'
  # @todo Support `nil` keyword in types
  # elsif node.type == :nil
  #   return 'NilClass'
  end
  nil
end
    pack_name(node) click to toggle source

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [Array<String>]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 15
def pack_name(node)
  parts = []
  if node.is_a?(AST::Node)
    node.children.each { |n|
      if n.is_a?(AST::Node)
        if n.type == :cbase
          parts = [''] + pack_name(n)
        else
          parts += pack_name(n)
        end
      else
        parts.push n unless n.nil?
      end
    }
  end
  parts
end
    resolve_node_signature(node) click to toggle source

    Get a call signature from a node. The result should be a string in the form of a method path, e.g., String.new or variable.method.

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [String]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 85
def resolve_node_signature node
  result = drill_signature node, ''
  return nil if result.empty?
  result
end
    returns_from(node) click to toggle source

    Find all the nodes within the provided node that potentially return a value.

    The node parameter typically represents a method's logic, e.g., the second child (after the :args node) of a :def node. A simple one-line method would typically return itself, while a node with conditions would return the resulting node from each conditional branch. Nodes that follow a :return node are assumed to be unreachable. Nil values are converted to nil node types.

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [Array<Parser::AST::Node>]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 138
def returns_from node
  DeepInference.get_return_nodes(node).map { |n| n || NIL_NODE }
end
    unpack_name(node) click to toggle source

    @param node [Parser::AST::Node] @return [String]

    # File lib/solargraph/source/node_methods.rb, line 9
def unpack_name(node)
  pack_name(node).join("::")
end
